definition: "long stride" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 54), occurring in 建, 延, 廷 etc
ninth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/ninth in order/letter "I" or Roman "IX" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 345°/nona
Frank Chang-ting Hsieh (1946-), Taiwanese DPP politician, mayor of Kaohsiung 1998-2005
the Qing court (as government of China)
the Papacy/the Vatican/the Church government/Holy See
place at the imperial court, where emperor handled government affairs, gave orders etc
Commandant of Justice in imperial China, one of the Nine Ministers 九卿[jiu3 qing1]
Borodin (name)/Alexander Porfirevich Borodin (1833-1887), Russian chemist and composer

Zhang Tingyu (1672-1755), Qing politician, senior minister to three successive emperors, oversaw compilation of History of the Ming Dynasty 明史[Ming2 shi3] and the Kangxi Dictionary 康熙字典[Kang1 xi1 Zi4 dian3]
Timbuktoo (town and historical cultural center in Mali, a World Heritage site)

sentences.english: What happened is that a group of Jihadists managed to infiltrate the town over night.
sentences.chinese: 一股圣战组织成员在夜间得以渗入廷巴克图。

sentences.english: This idea was promulgated in the book The Celestine Prophecy.
sentences.chinese: 这个想法在《塞莱斯廷预言》中有体现。
斯普林斯廷，这位象机修工一样诗人。

sentences.english: Thomas H. Brittain, for his support in putting on Rodeo 2011.
sentences.chinese: 托马斯H布里廷，他在投入上圈地2011的支持。

sentences.english: Twenty years ago, it was very hard to visualize what was happening in Timbuktu.
sentences.chinese: 20年前，我们很难想象廷巴克图发生了什么事。

sentences.english: Yes, please. Christine. Do you want any suger?
sentences.chinese: 好的，请来一杯，克里斯廷。

sentences.english: What separated Christine from the other applicants was her years of experience.
sentences.chinese: 使克里斯廷有别于其它应征者的是她多年的经验。

sentences.english: Tyndale has been described as one of the fathers of English literature.
sentences.chinese: 廷代尔被称为英国文学之父之一。

sentences.english: Fang Xian-ting is one of the most famous economists in ROC.
sentences.chinese: 方显廷是民国时期著名的中国经济学家之一。

sentences.english: Tyndale had simply pocketed the bishop’s money and used it to finance a fresh version of his translation.
sentences.chinese: 廷代尔轻松赚了主教的钱，拿来作新译本的出版经费。

sentences.english: Nobody in Paris ever saw Raoul and Christine again.
sentences.chinese: 巴黎没有人再见过拉乌尔和克丽斯廷。

definition: father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
to respect/to admire/to venerate/by the emperor himself
the imperial court/the government in imperial times
ancient bronze wine holder with 3 legs and loop handle/nobility
